dt-option.name: disableDays
dt-option.summary: Specify days that cannot be selected.

type.description: When this option is `null` any and all of the days of the week can be selected.
When this option is an array of numbers, any of the days indexes (0 indexed starting from Sunday) that are present here will not be selectable within the DateTime picker.

type.parameter: The index of the day to check if it is disabled or not.
type.description: If this option is a function it should take one parameter, a number representing the index of the day being checked (again, 0 indexed starting from Sunday) if that day should be selectable it returns `true`, otherwise `false`.

dt-option.default: As default, all of the days can be selected.
dt-option.description: This option allows for certain days to be unselectable. This is done by either setting this option to an array or function as detailed below.

example.title: Disable selection of Saturdays and Sundays
